definitions: a person who clears someone of blame or suspicion

examples.text: the champion and vindicator of his grandfather
an official vindicator for the French press

shortDefinitions: person who clears someone of blame or suspicion

definitions: a person who shows or proves something to be right, reasonable, or justified

examples.text: a vindicator of the property rights of the monks

shortDefinitions: person who shows something to be right
